card.name: ·Arod, Rohirrim Steed
card.text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. When you play Arod, you may reinforce a {Dwarven} token. Response: If bearer is about to take a wound during a skirmish, remove 2 {Dwarven} tokens to prevent that.

card.name: Awkward Moment
card.text: Make a Dwarf strength +3 (or +4 and damage +1 if you can spot a {Dwarven} token).

card.name: Deep Hatred
card.text: Each time the fellowship moves, add {2}. Skirmish: Exert a Dwarf who is not assigned to a skirmish to wound 2 Orcs (or to wound 1 Orc twice). Discard this from play if the fellowship is ahead on the adventure path.

card.name: Dwarf-lords
card.text: You may remove from the game 4 other {Dwarven} cards in your discard pile to play this event from your discard pile. Then remove this event from the game. Make your Dwarf bearing a hand weapon strength +3.

card.name: ·Gimli, Lord of the Glittering Caves
card.text: Damage +1. Gimli is strength +1 for each minion assigned to a skirmish. Assignment: Exert Gimli and spot a lurker minion to make that minion lose lurker until the regroup phase.

card.name: Honoring His Kinfolk
card.text: If a Dwarf wins a fierce skirmish, play a {Dwarven} possession from your discard pile and you may reinforce a {Dwarven} token.

card.name: Sorrow Shared
card.text: Remove a {Dwarven} token to heal a Dwarf.

card.name: ·Subterranean Homestead
card.text: To play, exert 2 Dwarves. When you play this, add a {Dwarven} token here for each mountain site and each underground site on the adventure path. Skirmish: Discard this from play or remove 2 tokens from here to make a Shadow player discard the top card of his or her draw deck.

card.name: ·Arwen, Reflection of Lúthien
card.text: While the fellowship is at a forest site, each of your other {Elven} companions is resistance +1. Skirmish: Exert Arwen to make a minion she is skirmishing strength -1 for each other companion assigned to a skirmish.

card.name: ·Asfaloth, Swift Blossom
card.text: Bearer must be an Elf. When you play Asfaloth, you may reinforce an {Elven} token. Skirmish: Remove 2 {Elven} tokens to heal bearer (or heal bearer and heal another Elf if bearer is in a fierce skirmish).

card.name: ·Celeborn, The Wise
card.text: While the fellowship is at a forest site, each Elf who has resistance 7 or more gains muster. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, you may take an {Elven} event into hand from your discard pile.

card.name: City of the Trees
card.text: At the end of your turn, discard this from play if the fellowship did not move more than once this turn. At the start of each skirmish involving an Elf and a wounded minion, you may draw a card.

card.name: Crashing Cavalry
card.text: Assignment: Discard this from play and assign a minion to an {Elven} companion. Those characters cannot use skirmish special abilities until the start of the regroup phase.

card.name: Final Shot
card.text: Make an {Elven} companion strength +2 (or +5 if the fellowship has moved more than once this turn).

card.name: ·Galadriel, Sorceress of the Hidden Land
card.text: To play, spot 3 Elves. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, you may reveal a card from the top of your draw deck for each forest on the adventure path to heal an Elf for each {Elven} card revealed.

card.name: Inside a Song
card.text: Exert an Elf to take an {Elven} skirmish event into hand from your discard pile and you may reinforce an {Elven} token.

card.name: Kindreds Estranged
card.text: You may remove from the game 4 other {Elven} cards in your discard pile to play this event from your discard pile. Then remove this event from the game. Make a minion skirmishing your Elf at a forest or river site strength -3.

card.name: ·Legolas, of the Grey Company
card.text: Archer. At the start of each archery phase, you may reveal the top card of your draw deck. If it is an {Elven} card, wound a minion.

card.name: Let Fly
card.text: Spot 3 Elves, spot a Shadow race, and choose a Shadow player to wound each of that player’s minions which is not of that race.

card.name: Lorien Protector
card.text: While another companion is assigned to a skirmish, during each skirmish, prevent all wounds to this companion after the first wound.

card.name: Many Miles
card.text: Spot 2 Elf archers to make the fellowship archery total +1 (or +2 if a Shadow player has replaced the fellowship’s current site this turn).

card.name: ·Secluded Homestead
card.text: To play, spot 2 Elves. When you play this, add an {Elven} token here for each forest site and each river site on the adventure path. Regroup: Discard this from play or remove 2 tokens from here to reconcile your hand.

card.name: Shrouded Elf
card.text: Response: If you play an event during a skirmish involving this companion, exert this companion to place that event on top of your draw deck.

card.name: Sprang Forth Nimbly
card.text: Make an Elf strength +1 for each card that has an {Elven} token on it.

card.name: Standing Tall
card.text: Skirmish: Discard this condition from play to make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -1 for each of the following that is true: it is skirmishing a companion who has resistance 4 or more; it is wounded; you can spot an Elf archer; the fellowship is at a forest site.

card.name: Take Up the Bow
card.text: Toil 2. (For each {Elven} character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2.) Archery: Discard this from play and spot 3 Elf archers to discard a minion from play. Each of those archers loses archer and cannot gain archer.

card.name: ·Wells of Deep Memory
card.text: At the end of your turn, discard this from play if the fellowship did not move more than once this turn. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, you may draw a card for each of the following you can spot: Arwen, Celeborn, or Galadriel.

card.name: ·Alatar, Final Envoy
card.text: Aid - {2}. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add {2} to transfer this to a companion.) Each time you transfer this to a companion, you may reinforce a {Gandalf} token. While you can spot a {Gandalf} companion, each minion skirmishing bearer is strength -1.

card.name: ·Dasron, Merchant from Dorwinion
card.text: At the start of the fellowship phase, you may remove 2 Free Peoples culture tokens to take a {Gandalf} event into hand from your discard pile.

card.name: ·Fear and Great Wonder
card.text: When you play this, add a {Gandalf} token here. Maneuver: Discard this from play or remove a token from here to spot a {Gandalf} companion. That companion gains muster until end of turn.

card.name: The Flame of Anor
card.text: Spell. Spot 3 {Gandalf} companions to make a minion skirmishing a companion strength -3.

card.name: For a While Less Dark
card.text: Spell. Make a {Gandalf} companion strength +2 (or +4 if that companion bears a follower).

card.name: ·Gandalf, Bearer of Obligation
card.text: While Gandalf is the Ring-bearer, each time the fellowship moves, add 3 burdens unless you spot 2 other companions and discard 2 {Gandalf} cards from hand.

card.name: Look to My Coming
card.text: You may remove from the game 4 other {Gandalf} cards in your discard pile to play this event from your discard pile. Then remove this event from the game. Spot Gandalf to make your {Gandalf} companion strength +3.

card.name: No Colour Now
card.text: Discard your {Gandalf} condition from play to discard a condition from play and draw a card.

card.name: ·The Palantir of Orthanc, Recovered Seeing Stone
card.text: Bearer must be Gandalf. To play this, if you can spot The Palantir of Orthanc, discard it. At the start of the fellowship phase, you may add a burden to reveal a Shadow player's hand. He or she must choose a revealed minion and discard it from hand.

card.name: ·Pallando, Far-travelling One
card.text: Aid - {2}. Each time you transfer this to a companion, except a {Gandalf} companion, exert bearer twice. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may discard a condition from play.

card.name: ·Radagast, Tender of Beasts
card.text: Aid - {2}. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add {2} to transfer this to a companion.) While you can spot 2 {Gandalf} companions, minions skirmishing bearer do not gain strength bonuses from possessions.

card.name: Return to Us
card.text: Discard 2 Shadow cards from hand to take a {Gandalf} event into hand from your discard pile.

card.name: ·Shadowfax, Roaring Wind
card.text: Bearer must be a Wizard. When you play Shadowfax, you may reinforce a {Gandalf} token. Skirmish: Remove 2 {Gandalf} tokens to wound a minion skirmishing bearer.

card.name: Strange Meeting
card.text: Each companion bearing a follower gains muster (and is strength +1 if that companion is a {Gandalf} companion).

card.name: ·Traveler's Homestead
card.text: To play, spot a Wizard. When you play this, add X {Gandalf} tokens here, where X is the current region number. Maneuver: Discard this from play or remove 2 tokens from here to discard a Shadow condition from play.

card.name: Vapour and Steam
card.text: Skirmish: Exert your {Gandalf} companion and add a burden to make that companion damage +1.

card.name: Chasm's Edge
card.text: Gollum is strength +1 for each Ring-bound companion you can spot.

card.name: Cunningly Hidden
card.text: You may remove from the game 4 {Gollum} cards in your discard pile instead of paying the twilight cost for this card. Spot Gollum to make a minion strength +2.

card.name: ·Deagol, Fateful Finder
card.text: To play, spot Sméagol. Aid - Add a burden. Skirmish: If bearer is not assigned to a skirmish, discard this from play to play an artifact or possession from your draw deck on bearer.

card.name: Duality
card.text: Spot Sméagol to choose a Shadow player who must discard a Shadow card from hand or remove {2}.

card.name: ·Fishing Boat
card.text: Bearer must be Sméagol. When you play Fishing Boat, you may reinforce a {Gollum} token. Each time Sméagol is about to be overwhelmed in a skirmish, you may remove 2 {Gollum} tokens to make him strength +2 until the end of that skirmish.

card.name: ·Gladden Homestead
card.text: To play, spot Sméagol. When you play this, add a {Gollum} token here for each {Gollum} card you can spot. Maneuver: Discard this from play or remove 2 tokens from here to spot a Shadow condition and place that condition on top of its owner’s draw deck.

card.name: ·Gollum, Her Sneak
card.text: While a card titled Deagol is removed from the game, Gollum is strength +2 and fierce. Shadow: Remove a card titled Deagol in your discard pile from the game to play this minion from your discard pile.

card.name: It's My Birthday
card.text: Make Gollum strength +2 (or +4 if you can spot Sméagol or Deagol).

card.name: Little Snuffler
card.text: If the fellowship is in region 1, spot Gollum to wound a companion. If the fellowship is in region 2, spot Gollum to exert a companion. If the fellowship is in region 3, play a {Gollum} minion from your discard pile.

card.name: Naked Waste
card.text: You may remove from the game 4 other {Gollum} cards in your discard pile to play this event from your discard pile. Then remove this event from the game. Spot Sméagol to make a Ring-bound companion strength +3.

card.name: Out of All Knowledge
card.text: Spot Sméagol or exert Gollum to make Sméagol strength +2 and you may reinforce a {Gollum} token.

card.name: ·Sméagol, Simple Stoor
card.text: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. For each card titled Deagol in your discard pile, Sméagol is strength +2 and resistance -1. Each time Sméagol wins a skirmish, you may take a {Gollum} card from your draw deck and place it in your discard pile.

card.name: Softly Up Behind
card.text: Spot Sméagol and discard 2 {Gollum} cards from hand to return a minion with strength 6 or less to its owner’s hand. While this is in your discard pile, Sméagol gains muster.

card.name: Trap Is Sprung
card.text: To play, discard Gollum from play. Heal the Ring-bearer to add a burden. If the fellowship is not in region 1, you may repeat this for each other wound on the Ring-bearer.

card.name: Wild Light of Madness
card.text: Spot Gollum to make the Free Peoples player choose to either add a burden or exert a companion.

card.name: ·Aragorn, Isildur's Heir
card.text: Aragorn is strength +1 for each {Gondor} card that has a culture token on it. At the start of each assignment phase, you may exert Aragorn to make an unbound companion that has resistance 7 or more defender +1 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Away on the Wind
card.text: Response: If Faramir is about to take a wound, discard this condition from play and place Boromir or Denethor in the dead pile from play to prevent that and heal Faramir twice.

card.name: Banners Blowing
card.text: You may remove from the game 4 other {Gondor} cards in your discard pile to play this event from your discard pile. Then remove this event from the game. Make your {Gondor} Man strength +3.

card.name: ·Boromir, Doomed Heir
card.text: Boromir is resistance -1 for each lurker minion you can spot. Skirmish: Exert Boromir to make him strength +1 for each possession he bears.

card.name: ·Brego, Loyal Steed
card.text: Bearer must be a {Gondor} companion. When you play Brego, you may reinforce a {Gondor} token. Maneuver: Exert bearer and remove 2 {Gondor} tokens to wound a minion.

card.name: ·Denethor, Last Ruling Steward
card.text: Denethor is resistance +1 for each {Gondor} possession in your discard pile. Maneuver: Spot a {Gondor} possession borne by a companion and remove that possession from the game to exert a minion twice.

card.name: ·Elendil, High-King of Gondor
card.text: Knight. To play, spot 2 {Gondor} knights or exert 2 {Gondor} Men. Each of your {Gondor} companions is resistance +1. Maneuver: Remove a {Gondor} token to make an unbound companion resistance +1 until the regroup phase.

card.name: ·Faramir, Prince of Ithilien
card.text: While you can spot Boromir, Faramir is twilight cost -1. While you can spot Denethor, Faramir is twilight cost -1. While Faramir bears a {Gondor} possession, he is defender +1.

card.name: Guard of the White Tree
card.text: Knight. Skirmish: Discard a {Gondor} condition from your support area to make this companion strength +2.

card.name: Guarded City
card.text: Spot a {Gondor} companion to reinforce a {Gondor} token for each possession borne by that companion.

card.name: ·Heirs of Gondor
card.text: When you play this, add a {Gondor} token here. Skirmish: Discard this from play or remove a token from here to make a {Gondor} companion bearing a hand weapon strength +2.

card.name: Hope Renewed
card.text: Discard a {Gondor} possession from play to discard a possession from play and you may reinforce a {Gondor} token.

card.name: ·Isildur, Heir of Elendil
card.text: Knight. Isildur is resistance +1 for each card in your hand. At the end of any phase, if Isildur has resistance 0, place him in your dead pile. Each time you reconcile, you may draw a card.

card.name: ·King's Legacy
card.text: Each time Elendil wins a skirmish, make a {Gondor} or {Elven} companion strength +2 until the start of the regroup phase. Each time Isildur wins a skirmish, heal a Man. Each time Aragorn wins a skirmish, make a {Gondor} Man damage +1 until the start of the regroup phase.

card.name: Kingsfoil
card.text: Bearer must be a {Gondor} Man. Fellowship: Discard this possession from play to heal a companion and, if that companion is a {Shire} companion, you may discard a condition he or she bears.

card.name: Rally the Company
card.text: Make a {Gondor} companion strength +2 (or +4 if that companion has resistance 6 or more).

card.name: ·Stewards' Legacy
card.text: Each time Denethor exerts, he gains muster until the end of the regroup phase. Each time Boromir exerts, you may exert a minion. Each time Faramir exerts, you may spot a minion to prevent it from using special abilites until the regroup phase.

card.name: ·Storied Homestead
card.text: When you play this, add a {Gondor} token here for each {Gondor} companion who has resistance 7 or more. Response: If a minion’s special ability is used, discard this condition or remove 2 {Gondor} tokens from here to cancel its effect.

card.name: Tradesman From Lebennin
card.text: At the start of each fellowship phase, you may add {2} to reinforce a {Gondor} token.

card.name: ·Alatar Deceived
card.text: Each time a Wizard wins a skirmish, this condition becomes a fierce, damage +1 Wizard minion until the start of the regroup phase that has 11 strength and 1 vitality, and cannot take wounds or bear other cards. This card is still a condition.

card.name: ·Pallando Deceived
card.text: At the start of the maneuver phase, you may exert a Wizard to make this condition a fierce Wizard minion until the start of the regroup phase that has 10 strength and 1 vitality, and cannot take wounds or bear other cards. This card is still a condition.

card.name: ·Radagast Deceived
card.text: Each time a Wizard heals, this condition becomes a fierce Wizard minion until the start of the regroup phase that has 12 strength and 1 vitality, and cannot take wounds or bear other cards. This card is still a condition.

card.name: ·Staff of Saruman, Fallen Istar's Stave
card.text: Bearer must be a Wizard. Regroup: If Saruman is the only minion you can spot, discard this artifact from play to return him to your hand.

card.name: Bring Down the Wall
card.text: Spot a companion to make a {Men} minion strength +1 for each wound on that companion.

card.name: Caravan From the South
card.text: To play, spot a {Men} minion. When you play this, if you spot a plains site on the adventure path, reinforce 3 {Men} tokens. Each time the Free Peoples player plays the fellowship’s next site, you may discard a possession from play.

card.name: Corsair Champion
card.text: Each time a Free Peoples possession is played, you may spot a {Men} card and reveal this minion from hand to make the Free Peoples player exert a companion. While each companion is wounded, this minion is fierce.

card.name: Cruel Dunlending
card.text: Skirmish: If this minion is not assigned to a skirmish, you may exert him to make another {Men} minion fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Desert Wind
card.text: To play, spot a {Men} minion. While you can spot 5 or more culture tokens, the minion archery total is +2.

card.name: Driven From the Plains
card.text: Skirmish: Discard this condition from play to make a {Men} minion damage +1 for each of the following that is true: it is at a plains site; it is bearing a possession; it is skirmishing a companion who has resistance 4 or less.

card.name: Dunlending Patriarch
card.text: When you play this, you may spot another {Men} minion to make this minion twilight cost -1 for each wound on the Ring-bearer. While each companion is wounded, this minion is fierce.

card.name: Dunlending Trapper
card.text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved before any others.) To play, spot a {Men} minion. Assignment: Discard a {Men} card from your hand to assign this minion to an unbound companion.

card.name: Easterling Runner
card.text: Shadow: Exert this minion, spot another {Men} minion, and remove a culture token to reinforce a {Men} token.

card.name: Fires Brightly Burning
card.text: You may remove from the game 4 {Men} cards in your discard pile instead of paying the twilight cost for this card. Make your {Men} minion strength +2.

card.name: ·Grima, Footman of Saruman
card.text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Each time a Free Peoples character is killed, you may spot another {Men} minion to exert each companion.

card.name: Harmless
card.text: Response: If a companion loses a skirmish involving a {Men} minion, transfer this condition from your support area to that companion. Limit 1 per companion. Minions cannot take wounds during skirmishes involving bearer.

card.name: Howdah
card.text: When you play this, add a {Men} token here for each {Men} archer you spot. At the start of the archery phase, you may discard this condition from play or remove 2 tokens from here to make the minion archery total +1.

card.name: Lying in Wait
card.text: Skirmish: Transfer this condition from your support area to your {Men} minion. (Limit 1 per bearer.) Bearer is strength +1 for each other {Men} minion you can spot. Each time a {Men} minion wins a skirmish, make bearer strength +1 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Merciless Dunlending
card.text: While you can spot another {Men} minion, this minion is strength +2 for each companion assigned to a skirmish.

card.name: Pirate Cutthroat
card.text: To play, spot a {Men} card in your support area. Shadow: Exert this minion and spot a Free Peoples condition to reinforce a {Men} token for each card you spot that has the same card title as that condition.

card.name: Southron Murderer
card.text: Archer. While you can spot 4 or more culture tokens, this minion cannot take wounds except during skirmishes.

card.name: Stragglers
card.text: When you play this, add a {Men} token here. Skirmish: Discard this from play or remove a token from here to make a {Men} minion strength +2 for each {Men} minion not assigned to a skirmish.

card.name: Vicious Dunlending
card.text: Skirmish: If this minion is not assigned to a skirmish, you may exert him to make another {Men} minion damage +1.

card.name: ·Voice of the Desert, Southron Troop
card.text: To play, spot a {Men} minion. While the fellowship is in region 1, each {Men} minion cannot take wounds. While the fellowship is in region 2, each {Men} minion is an archer. While the fellowship is in region 3, each {Men} minion is fierce.

card.name: Worn Battleaxe
card.text: Bearer must be a {Men} minion. While you can spot a culture token, bearer is strength +1 for each companion assigned to a skirmish.

card.name: Always Threatening
card.text: When you play this, you may add an {Orc} token here for each {Orc} condition you can spot. Skirmish: Discard this from play or remove 2 tokens from here to make a lurker minion strength +2.

card.name: ·Chamber Patrol
card.text: To play, spot an {Orc} minion. While the fellowship is in region 1, {Orc} Orcs cannot take wounds. While the fellowship is in region 2, the current site gains underground. While the fellowship is in region 3, each {Orc} Orc is strength +2.

card.name: Defiled
card.text: You may remove from the game 4 {Orc} cards in your discard pile instead of paying the twilight cost for this card. Make your {Orc} lurker minion strength +2.

card.name: Enemy Upon Enemy
card.text: Regroup: Spot an {Orc} lurker minion to stack that minion here. Shadow: Remove a burden to play a lurker minion stacked here as if from hand. That minion is twilight cost -3.

card.name: Expendable Servants
card.text: If you can spot more {Orc} conditions than {Orc} minions, you may discard your {Orc} condition from play to play an {Orc} minion from your discard pile.

card.name: Forced March
card.text: To play, spot 2 {Orc} minions. Regroup: Make the Free Peoples player spot another {Orc} condition, discard it from play, and remove {3} to make the Free Peoples player choose to move again this turn (if the move limit allows). Discard this condition.

card.name: Howling Orc
card.text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved before any others.) Each time an {Orc} minion is killed in a skirmish, you may make this minion strength +2 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Isengard Informant
card.text: Regroup: Exert this minion to play an {Orc} Troll from your discard pile.

card.name: Massing Strength
card.text: Discard any number of your {Orc} minions from play to make an {Orc} minion strength +3 for each one discarded.

card.name: ·Orc Crusher
card.text: To play, spot an {Orc} Orc. This minion is twilight cost -1 for each burden. Each time a Ring-bound companion loses a skirmish involving an {Orc} minion, you may reveal this card from hand to add a burden.

card.name: Orc Line-breaker
card.text: At the end of each skirmish involving this minion, if you can spot a Free Peoples culture token, this minion is fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Orc Plains Runner
card.text: Regroup: Discard this minion from play (or exert this minion if the fellowship’s next site is an underground site) and spot another {Orc} minion to return that minion to your hand.

card.name: Orc Raid Commander
card.text: To play, spot an {Orc} card in your support area. When you play this, spot a Free Peoples condition to discard from play each other card that has the same card title as that condition.

card.name: Orc Reaper
card.text: While you can spot a Free Peoples culture token, each minion that has the title Orc Reaper is strength +2.

card.name: Ordnance Grunt
card.text: Damage +1. Fierce. To play, spot an {Orc} minion. Shadow: Discard an {Orc} condition from play to play this minion from your discard pile.

card.name: Picket Denizen
card.text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Response: If another {Orc} minion is about to take a wound, exert this minion to prevent that.

card.name: Underdeeps Denizen
card.text: While this minion is at an underground site, it cannot take wounds.

card.name: Unforgiving Depths
card.text: While you can spot 3 underground sites, each {Orc} Orc gains muster. Shadow: Discard this condition from play and spot an {Orc} minion to replace the fellowship’s current site with an underground site from your adventure deck.

card.name: Whatever Means
card.text: Make an {Orc} Orc strength +2 (or +6 if you remove 2 burdens).

card.name: Bitter Tidings
card.text: If Théoden is about to take a wound in a skirmish, you may discard from play Éomer or Theodred to prevent that. If Theodred is about to take a wound in a skirmish, you may discard from play Éomer or Éowyn to prevent that.

card.name: ·Éomer, Heir to Meduseld
card.text: While Éomer bears a mount, he is damage +1. While no other companion is assigned to a skirmish, Éomer is strength +1 for each other {Rohan} companion you can spot.

card.name: ·Éowyn, Restless Warrior
card.text: Each possession you play on Éowyn during the fellowship phase is twilight cost -1. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, you may reinforce a {Rohan} token (or reinforce 2 {Rohan} tokens if you can spot Éomer or Théoden).

card.name: Ferthu Théoden Hal
card.text: To play, spot 2 {Rohan} Men. Unless you can spot a companion who has resistance 3 or less, discard a possession from play.

card.name: ·Firefoot, Mearas of the Mark
card.text: Bearer must be a {Rohan} Man. When you play Firefoot, you may reinforce a {Rohan} token. At the start of the maneuver phase, if bearer is Éomer, you may remove 2 {Rohan} tokens to make him defender +1 and strength +1 until the regroup phase.

card.name: ·Freely Across Our Land
card.text: When you play this, add a {Rohan} token here. Regroup: Discard this from play or remove a token from here to play a {Rohan} possession from your discard pile on your {Rohan} companion.

card.name: ·Hama, Captain of the King's Guard
card.text: Hama is strength +1 for each Shadow possession you can spot. Each time Hama wins a skirmish, you may discard a possession from play.

card.name: Hamstrung
card.text: Make a {Rohan} companion strength +2 (or +5 if the fellowship has moved twice this turn).

card.name: Hurried Barrows
card.text: You may remove from the game 4 other {Rohan} cards in your discard pile to play this event from your discard pile. Then remove this event from the game. Make your mounted {Rohan} companion strength +3.

card.name: ·King's Board
card.text: Skirmish: Exert Éomer to make Éowyn or Théoden strength +2. Skirmish: Exert Éowyn to make Éomer or Théoden strength +2. Skirmish: Exert Théoden to make Éomer or Éowyn strength +2.

card.name: Merchant of Westfold
card.text: Each time the fellowship moves, you may add {1} and remove a Free Peoples culture token to reinforce a {Rohan} token.

card.name: Riddermark Tactician
card.text: When you play this, you may reinforce a {Rohan} token. Each time a Shadow player replaces the fellowship’s current site, you may spot another {Rohan} Man to make, until the regroup phase, the fellowship archery total +2 and the minion archery total -2.

card.name: Ride With Me
card.text: Make your {Rohan} companion strength +2 (or exert Théoden to make that companion strength +5 and damage +1 instead.)

card.name: Rider's Bow
card.text: Bearer must be a {Rohan} Man. If bearer is mounted, he or she is strength +1. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may choose a Shadow player who must wound one of his or her minions.

card.name: ·Snowmane, Noble Mearas
card.text: Bearer must be a {Rohan} Man. When you play Snowmane, you may reinforce a {Rohan} token. Skirmish: If bearer is Théoden, you may remove 2 {Rohan} tokens to exhaust a minion he is skirmishing.

card.name: ·Théoden, The Renowned
card.text: While you can spot Éowyn, Théoden is defender +1. While you can spot Éomer, Théoden is damage +1. While you can spot Theodred, the move limit is +1.

card.name: ·Theodred, Second Marshal of the Mark
card.text: While you can spot a {Rohan} Man who has resistance of 7 or more, Theodred is twilight cost -1. At the start of each skirmish involving Theodred, you may exert each minion he is skirmishing.

card.name: ·Wind-swept Homestead
card.text: To play, spot 2 {Rohan} companions. When you play this, add a {Rohan} token here for each plains site and each battleground site on the adventure path. At the start of each regroup phase, add a {Rohan} token here for each of your companions that has muster.

card.name: ·Sauron, Dark Lord of Mordor
card.text: Damage +1. Fierce. When you play Sauron, you may exert any number of minions. For each minion you exert, Sauron is twilight cost -X, where X is the current region number.

card.name: ·Sceptre of the Dark Lord
card.text: Bearer must be Sauron. He is damage +1. Each time Sauron wins a skirmish and the companion he is skirmishing is not killed, you may assign X wounds to other companions, where X is the current region number.

card.name: ·Bilbo, Aged Ring-bearer
card.text: Ring-bound. While Bilbo is not assigned to a skirmish, each Ring-bound Hobbit is strength +1. At the start of each skirmish involving Bilbo, you may remove a burden for each other Ring-bound Hobbit you can spot.

card.name: ·Bill the Pony, Dearly-loved
card.text: Bearer must be a Ring-bound Hobbit. When you play Bill the Pony, you may reinforce a {Shire} token. Regroup: Spot 2 minions and remove 2 {Shire} tokens to make a Shadow player discard a minion from play.

card.name: ·Daddy Twofoot, Next-door Neighbor
card.text: Aid - Add a burden. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add a burden to transfer this to a companion.) Each time you transfer this to a companion, you may take a {Shire} event into hand from your discard pile.

card.name: Don't Let Go
card.text: Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a Hobbit strength +1 for each of the following that is true: he or she is participating in a fierce skirmish; he or she has resistance 7 or more; he or she is at a dwelling site; you can spot an unwounded Hobbit.

card.name: Everything but My Bones
card.text: You may remove from the game 4 other {Shire} cards in your discard pile to play this event from your discard pile. Then remove this event from the game. Make your Hobbit at a dwelling or forest site strength +3.

card.name: ·Faith in Friendship
card.text: When you play this, add a {Shire} token here. At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard this from play or remove a token from here to heal a {Shire} companion.

card.name: Fates Entwined
card.text: Each time a Hobbit wins a skirmish, you may heal another Hobbit once (or heal another Hobbit twice if the Hobbit that won the skirmish was Frodo or Bilbo).

card.name: ·Frodo, Frenzied Fighter
card.text: Ring-bound. While you can spot more minions than companions, Frodo cannot be overwhelmed unless his strength is tripled. Skirmish: If Frodo is not assigned to a skirmish, exert Frodo to have him replace a Ring-bound companion skirmishing a minion.

card.name: ·Frodo Gamgee, Son of Samwise
card.text: Aid - Add 2 burdens. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add 2 burdens to transfer this to a companion.) To play, spot a Ring-bound Hobbit. Bearer is strength +1 for each Ring-bound Hobbit you can spot.

card.name: ·The Gaffer, Master Gardener
card.text: Aid - Add a burden. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add a burden to transfer this to a companion.) When you transfer The Gaffer to a {Shire} companion, heal bearer (or heal bearer twice if he or she is at a dwelling site.)

card.name: ·Humble Homestead
card.text: To play, spot 2 Hobbits. When you play this, add a {Shire} token here for each forest site and each dwelling site on the adventure path. Skirmish: Discard this from play or remove 3 tokens from here to cancel a skirmish involving a Hobbit.

card.name: ·Mithril-coat, Dwarf-mail
card.text: Bearer must be a Ring-bound Hobbit. Each minion skirmishing bearer loses all damage bonuses. Skirmish: Exert bearer to make each minion he is skirmishing lose fierce and unable to gain fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: New Chapter
card.text: To play, spot 2 Hobbits. Each time you play a follower, you may heal a companion (or heal Sam twice).

card.name: ·Phial of Galadriel, The Light of Earendil
card.text: Bearer must be a Ring-bound Hobbit. While bearer is in region 1, bearer gains muster. While bearer is in region 2, each of your {Shire} companions gains muster. While bearer is in region 3, each character gains muster.

card.name: ·Sam, Bearer of Great Need
card.text: Ring-bound. Sam is resistance +1 for each Hobbit you can spot. Regroup: Exert Sam and transfer a follower he is bearing to your support area to discard a minion from play.

card.name: Westfarthing Businessman
card.text: This companion is strength +1 for each {Shire} card that has a culture token on it.

card.name: Assault Commander
card.text: Damage +1. Shadow: Exert this minion and spot a Free Peoples condition to make an unbound companion resistance -1 for each card that has the same card title as that condition.

card.name: Assault Denizen
card.text: Damage +1. This minion is strength +1 for each Free Peoples culture token you can spot.

card.name: Cavern Denizen
card.text: Damage +1. While you can spot a Free Peoples culture token, this minion cannot take wounds except during skirmishes.

card.name: Endless Assault
card.text: Skirmish: Discard this condition to make an {Uruk-hai} minion strength +1 for each of the following that is true: it is at a battleground site; it is skirmishing a companion who has resistance 4 or less; it is bearing a possession; you can spot an {Uruk-hai} minion not assigned to a skirmish.

card.name: Enemy Without Number
card.text: To play, spot 2 {Uruk-hai} minions. Shadow: Discard 2 cards from hand to add {1}. Regroup: Spot an {Uruk-hai} minion and discard this condition from play to add {3}.

card.name: Entranced Uruk
card.text: Damage +1. Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Possessions borne by this minion cannot be discarded by Free Peoples cards.

card.name: Fearless Approach
card.text: To play, spot an {Uruk-hai} minion. When you play this, if you spot a battleground site on the adventure path, reinforce 3 {Uruk-hai} tokens. Each time the Free Peoples player plays the fellowship’s next site, you may discard a condition from play.

card.name: Isengard Infiltrator
card.text: Damage +1. While the fellowship is at a forest site, the fellowship archery total is -1. Each {Elven} companion skirmishing this minion is strength -2.

card.name: New Enemy
card.text: You may remove from the game 4 {Uruk-hai} cards in your discard pile instead of paying the twilight cost for this card. Make your {Uruk-hai} minion skirmishing a companion with resistance 4 or less strength +2.

card.name: ·Signs of War
card.text: While you can spot 3 {Uruk-hai} lurker minions, at the start of each skirmish involving an {Uruk-hai} lurker minion, each companion skirmishing that minion must exert.

card.name: Uruk Aggressor
card.text: Damage +1. When you play this, you may spot a companion who has resistance 0 to make this minion twilight cost -2.

card.name: ·Uruk Blitz
card.text: To play, spot an {Uruk-hai} minion. While the fellowship is in region 1, each Uruk-hai is damage +1. While the fellowship is in region 2, each companion is strength -1. While the fellowship is in region 3, each unbound companion is resistance -2.

card.name: Uruk Distractor
card.text: Damage +1. Skirmish: If this minion is not assigned to a skirmish, you may exert it to discard a possession borne by a companion skirmishing another {Uruk-hai} minion.

card.name: Uruk Invader
card.text: Damage +1. This minion is twilight cost -1 for each companion who has resistance 2 or less.

card.name: Uruk Outrider
card.text: This minion is damage +1 for each character in the dead pile.

card.name: Uruk Reserve
card.text: Damage +1. Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Each time your {Uruk-hai} minion is about to be killed in a skirmish, you may place that minion on the bottom of your draw deck instead.

card.name: Uruk Rogue
card.text: Damage +1. Skirmish: If no other minions are assigned to a skirmish, you may exert this minion twice to make it fierce and strength +4 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Uruk Tactician
card.text: Damage +1. Skirmish: Exert this minion to make a companion skirmishing an {Uruk-hai} lurker minion strength -2.

card.name: War Machine
card.text: Exert your {Uruk-hai} lurker minion to play an {Uruk-hai} hand weapon from your discard pile on your {Uruk-hai} minion.

card.name: Weapons of Control
card.text: When you play this, add an {Uruk-hai} token here for each wounded companion. Skirmish: Discard this from play or remove 2 tokens from here to make a companion skirmishing an {Uruk-hai} minion strength -1.

card.name: Dark Fell About Him
card.text: To play, exert your Nazgûl twice and spot an exhausted companion. Heal that companion to add a burden. If the fellowship is not in region 1, you may repeat this for each other wound on that companion.

card.name: From Hideous Eyrie
card.text: You may remove from the game 4 {Ringwraith} cards in your discard pile instead of paying the twilight cost for this card. Make your Nazgûl in a fierce skirmish strength +2.

card.name: Shadow in the East
card.text: Toil 1. (For each {Ringwraith} character you exert when playing this, it is twilight cost -1.) To play, spot a {Ringwraith} card in your support area. Spot a companion to draw a card for each wound on that companion (and draw an additional card if you can spot a Nazgûl).

card.name: They Came From Mordor
card.text: When you play this, you may add a {Ringwraith} token here for each {Ringwraith} card in your support area. Shadow: Discard this from play or remove 2 tokens from here to play a {Ringwraith} mount from your draw deck on your {Ringwraith} minion.

card.name: ·Úlairë Enquëa, Sixth of the Nine Riders
card.text: Fierce. When you play Úlairë Enquëa, if you can spot 2 other Nazgûl, you may exert 2 unbound companions (or exert each companion if you can spot 6 companions).

card.name: ·Úlairë Lemenya, Servant of the Shadow
card.text: Fierce. Shadow: Exert Úlairë Lemenya and discard a Nazgûl from your hand to discard a condition from play.

card.name: ·Úlairë Nertëa, Servant of the Shadow
card.text: Fierce. While you can spot a companion who has resistance 3 or less, Úlairë Nertëa is twilight cost -2.

card.name: Abandoned Mine Shaft
card.text: Underground. If this site is not in region 1 when the fellowship moves from here during the regroup phase, add a burden.

card.name: Caves of Aglarond
card.text: Underground. When the fellowship moves to this site during the regroup phase, the Free Peoples player may remove 2 burdens.

card.name: City of Kings
card.text: Battleground. When the fellowship moves to this site during the regroup phase, the Free Peoples player may draw a card.

card.name: Courtyard Parapet
card.text: Dwelling. When the fellowship moves to this site, the first Shadow player may discard 2 cards from hand to add a burden.

card.name: Crossroads of the Fallen Kings
card.text: Forest. When the fellowship moves to this site during the regroup phase, the Free Peoples player may heal a companion of each culture.

card.name: Doors of Durin
card.text: Marsh. Each companion of a race that has the most companions is strength -1 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Fords of Isen
card.text: River. Each character is strength +1 for each card borne by that character.

card.name: The Great Gates
card.text: Battleground. While a player can spot more companions than minions, each minion is strength +1.

card.name: Isenwash
card.text: Battleground. Plains. At the start of the regroup phase, each Shadow player may exert a minion to exert a companion.

card.name: Redhorn Pass
card.text: Mountain. Culture tokens cannot be added, removed, or reinforced.
